verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> were <S%G305>going<s%> up to the <S%G2413>temple<s%> at the <S%G7067>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>[hour,<s%>] the hour of <S%G4335>prayer.<s%>

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> who had <S%G5225>been<s%> <S%G5560>lame<s%> from his mother's <S%G2836>womb<s%> was being <S%G941>carried<s%> along, <S%G3739>whom<s%> they used to <S%G5087>set<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> at the <S%G2374>gate<s%> of the <S%G2413>temple<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5611>Beautiful,<s%> in order to <S%G154>beg<s%> <S%G1654>alms<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G1531>entering<s%> the <S%G2413>temple.<s%>

And when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1524>go<s%> into the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> he [began] <S%G2065>asking<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1654>alms.<s%>
And <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G4862>along<s%> with <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G816>fixed<s%> his <S%G816>gaze<s%> upon him and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G991>"Look<s%> at us!"
And he [began] to <S%G1907>give<s%> them his <S%G1907>attention,<s%> <S%G4328>expecting<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> from them.

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I do not <S%G5225>possess<s%> <S%G694>silver<s%> and <S%G5553>gold,<s%> but <S%G3739>what<s%> I do <S%G2192>have<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to you: In the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G3480>Nazarene<s%> â€“ <S%G4043>walk!<s%>"

And <S%G4084>seizing<s%> him by the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> he <S%G1453>raised<s%> him up; and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> his <S%G939>feet<s%> and his <S%G4974>ankles<s%> were <S%G4732>strengthened.<s%>

And with a <S%G1814>leap,<s%> he <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2476>upright<s%> and [began] to <S%G4043>walk;<s%> and he <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G2413>temple<s%> with them, <S%G4043>walking<s%> and <S%G242>leaping<s%> and <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> him <S%G4043>walking<s%> and <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%>

and they were <S%G1921>taking<s%> <S%G1921>note<s%> of him as <S%G1510>being<s%> the one who used to <S%G2521>sit<s%> at the <S%G5611>Beautiful<s%> <S%G4439>Gate<s%> of the <S%G2413>temple<s%> to [beg] <S%G1654>alms,<s%> and they were <S%G4092>filled<s%> with <S%G2285>wonder<s%> and <S%G1611>amazement<s%> at what had <S%G4819>happened<s%> to him.

And while he was <S%G2902>clinging<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G4936>ran<s%> <S%G4936>together<s%> to them at the so-called <S%G4745>portico<s%> of <S%G4672>Solomon,<s%> <S%G1569>full<s%> of <S%G1569>amazement.<s%>

But when <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3778>[this<s%>], he <S%G611>replied<s%> to the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G435>"Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2296>marvel<s%> at this, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G816>gaze<s%> at us, as <S%G5613>if<s%> by our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2150>piety<s%> we had <S%G4160>made<s%> him <S%G4043>walk<s%>?

"The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> has <S%G1392>glorified<s%> His <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> [the one] <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up, and <S%G720>disowned<s%> in the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> when he had <S%G2919>decided<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> Him.
"But you <S%G720>disowned<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> and <S%G1342>Righteous<s%> <S%G1342>One,<s%> and <S%G154>asked<s%> for a <S%G5406>murderer<s%> to be <S%G5483>granted<s%> to you,

but <S%G615>put<s%> to <S%G615>death<s%> the <S%G747>Prince<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> [the one] <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> [a fact] to <S%G3739>which<s%> we are <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

"And on the <S%G1909>basis<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> in His <S%G3686>name,<s%> [it is] the <S%G3686>name<s%> of Jesus which has <S%G4732>strengthened<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G2334>see<s%> and <S%G3609>know;<s%> and the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which [comes] <S%G1223>through<s%> Him has <S%G1325>given<s%> him <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3647>perfect<s%> <S%G3647>health<s%> in the <S%G561>presence<s%> of you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
"And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I <S%G3609>know<s%> that you <S%G4238>acted<s%> in <S%G52>ignorance,<s%> <S%G5618>just<s%> as your <S%G758>rulers<s%> did <S%G2532>also.<s%>

"But the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4293>announced<s%> <S%G4293>beforehand<s%> by the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> that His <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should <S%G3958>suffer,<s%> He has <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>

<S%G3340>"Repent<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> and <S%G1994>return,<s%> that your <S%G266>sins<s%> may be <S%G1813>wiped<s%> <S%G1813>away,<s%> in <S%G3704>order<s%> that <S%G2540>times<s%> of <S%G403>refreshing<s%> may <S%G2064>come<s%> from the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
and that He may <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4400>appointed<s%> for you,

<S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> [the] <S%G5550>period<s%> of <S%G605>restoration<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> about <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> by the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of His <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> from <S%G165>ancient<s%> <S%G165>time.<s%>

<S%G3475>"Moses<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G450>raise<s%> up for you a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> me from your <S%G80>brethren;<s%> to Him you shall <S%G191>give<s%> <S%G191>heed<s%> in <S%G3956>everything<s%> He <S%G2980>says<s%> to you.

'And it shall be that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> that does not <S%G191>heed<s%> that <S%G4396>prophet<s%> shall be <S%G1842>utterly<s%> <S%G1842>destroyed<s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>'

"And <S%G2532>likewise,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken,<s%> from <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> and [his] <S%G2517>successors<s%> <S%G2517>onward,<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2605>announced<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

"It is you who are the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1303>made<s%> with your <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> 'And in your <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3965>families<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall be <S%G1757>blessed.<s%>'

"For you <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G450>raised<s%> up His <S%G3816>Servant,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> Him to <S%G2127>bless<s%> you by <S%G654>turning<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> [of you] from your <S%G4189>wicked<s%> <S%G4189>ways.<s%>"
